item.title: The War of Art
item.description: Author : Steven Pressfield Book Link : The War of Art: Break Through the Blocks and Win Your Inner Creative Battles “The War of Art” is a concise, engaging, and practical guide to success in any creative field. It serves as a modern Sun-Tzu for the soul, addressing the internal obstacles that prevent us from achieving our goals. Bestselling novelist Steven Pressfield identifies the inner enemy we all face, provides a battle plan to overcome it, and explains how to achieve the highest level of creative discipline.
